SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , ADMIN_ID , NOTICE_COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN ADMIN ON(NOTICE_WRITER = ADMIN_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) B ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , ADMIN_ID , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN ADMIN ON(NOTICE_WRITER = ADMIN_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
